Description.Text: The hotel affords magnificent views of Mount Teide and the ocean, and is composed of several beautiful,renovated 18th century Canarian houses. Situated on the slopes of Barranco Ruiz at an altitude of 600 metres, the hotel is both an idyllic location for nature lovers and an area of great scientific interest. The hotel, surrounded by a rural 'finca' of 15000 mÂ², offers its clients the opportunity to enjoy the calm and beauty of its landscape in any of its 20 rooms. All rooms are fully equipped with all the modern amenities, to ensure a high degree of comfort. This desire to aid relaxation can also be seen in the hotel's pubic areas, where one will find an indoor heated swimming pool, jacuzzi, bar, lounge, restaurant and wine cellar. The Hotel has secure outdoor parking free of charge and disabled access. The hotel has 20, fully equipped rooms to make your stay in Tenerife a pleasant one. All have individual heating, bathroom, hair dryer, and bathrobe, satellite TV, direct telephone line, Internet connection, security box and balcony or terrace. There are several rooms with sea view and the rest with views of Mount Teide.
Los Realejos Village is one of the most privileged areas in Tenerife. Almost 50% of its land, including El Teide National Park or La Corona Forestal Natural Park, is protected by environmental laws.

Junior Suite - Room offers a double bed or two twin beds with balcony/terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, color TV, ensuite/private bathroom, heating, Jacuzzi/whirlpool/spa bath ( Jacuzzi in suites ), non smoking rooms, safe in room and telephone.
Superior Room With Terrace - Room offers a double bed or two twin beds with balcony/terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, color TV, ensuite/private bathroom, heating, Jacuzzi/whirlpool/spa bath (Jacuzzi in suites), non smoking rooms, safe in room and telephone.
Special Offer - Room offers a double bed or two twin beds with balcony/terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, color TV, ensuite/private bathroom, heating, Jacuzzi/whirlpool/spa bath (Jacuzzi in suites), non smoking rooms, safe in room and telephone.
